text: Hello! Is there a way to customize quote templates?

Hi everyone! I’m working in a drag and drop customization for my company website, and I having some issues to save the changes. HS is showing me that has some erros and doesn’t allow me to save the changes. As I not working on the code level, and this never happens before I here to check if any HubSpot specialist can help me with that.

Note that I already spoke with the theme author and he checked on his end and looks like I’m doing all correct.

Thanks!
Could you share a screenshot of the error?
I take it you have added modules to a template and can't save it is that correct?
